MOSCOW , May 19 ( Reuters ) - Russian President Vladimir Putin and U.N. Secretary General Ban Ki - moon will discuss the Ukraine crisis and other issues during a meeting on Tuesday in Shanghai , China , the Itar - Tass news agency quoted Putin 's spokesman , Dmitry Peskov , as saying .
